messages.subject: Unschooling on Less
messages.msgSnippet: I am posting to let all of you know that I have made a list for others like me looking to learn how to unschool on less. I know that there are some amazing
messages.messageBody:
I am posting to let all of you know that I have made a list for
others like me looking to learn how to unschool on less. I know that
there are some amazing people here that could share how they live and
what they know. A great deal of shall go into this list and a lot of
research shall be done to help all of us learn to get what we need as
we also show our children how to do it.

Please excuse the newness of the group as I just made it today. I
am very interested in finding other moderators to help me with this.

Link: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ParentingPennys/

Thank you so very dearly.

Kimberly

P.S. Unschooling is not something you do for the kids, it is for the
family, the future, it is a way of life, it is beautful.
